reference: Abel, Andrew B., Avinash K. Dixit, Janice C. Eberly and Robert S. Pindyck (1996), Options, the Value of Capital, and Investment, Quarterly Journal of Economics, pp. 753-777.

Cukierman, Alex (1980), The Effects of Uncertainty on Investment under Risk Neutrality with Endogenous Information, Journal of Political Economy, 88:462-75.
Dixit, Avinash K. and Robert S. Pindyck (1994), Investment under Uncertainty, Princeton University Press, Princeton, NJ.
Duffie, Darrell (1996), Dynamic Asset Pricing Theory, ~nd Ed., Princeton University Press, Princeton, NJ.
Dunn, Kenneth B., and Chester S. Spatt (1997), Call Options, Points and Dominance Restrictions on Debt Contracts, working paper.
Ingersoll, Jonathan E. and Stephen A. Ross (1992), Waiting to Invest: Investment and Uncertainty, Journal of Business, 65:1-28.
LeRoy, Stephen F. (1996), Mortgage Valuation Under Optimal Prepayment Review of Financial Studies, 9:817-44.
McDonald, Robert and Daniel R. Siegel (1986), The Value of Waiting to Invest, Quarterly Journal of Economics, 101:707-27.
Pindyck, Robert 5. (1988), Irreversible Investment, Capacity Choice, and the Value of the Firm American Economic Review, 78:969-85.
Pindyck, Robert 5. (1991), Irreversibility, Uncertainty and Investment, Journal of Economic Literature, 29:1110-1148.
